attributes.action: Allow hunting In the lake Disitict national park
attributes.additional_details:
Allow Hunting In The Following National Parks.
Exmoor National National Park,
North Yorkshire Moors National Park,
Yorkshire Dales National Park,
Cairngorms National Park.
Open Each Park For Hunting of all pest species deer and wild boar (Only on the right time of year).
There are 180,000 Shooters In England and There are no places were shooters can just go and shoot targets and hunt without having to beg landlords for permission to shoot.
This will prevent the Poaching all over the United Kingdom and Help Control The Deer Population.
